original_text: And if Christ has not been raised, then our preaching is in vain and your faith is in vain.
korean_text: 그리스도께서 만일 다시 살아나지 못하셨으면 우리가 전파하는 것도 헛것이요 또 너희 믿음도 헛것이며

sentences.original_text: And if Christ has not been raised
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그리스도께서 다시 살아나지 않으셨다면

sentences.original_text: then our preaching is in vain
and your faith is in vain
